text: Vilhelm Botyov Kraus () (22 April 1949 â€“ 5 June 2020) was a Bulgarian politician. He was Minister of Transport in the Kostov Government between 1997 and 1999. He was born in Sofia. In the 1990s, he served as vice-mayor of Sofia. Kraus died on 5 June 2020 in Sofia, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bulgarian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Sofia
title: Vilhelm Kraus
